200.description:
API reponds to the Site model. 

See ( link )

get.description:
A client can consume the array of the information for the sites(facilities) that is integrated with the partner.

(https://quikstor.stoplight.io/docs/quikstor-thirdparty-access/reference/ThirdParty.v1.json/components/schemas/SiteId).

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Header values to be bearer token in a format "bearer access-token"

200.description: API reponds to the Site model.

Authorization.description: Header values to be bearer token in a format "bearer access-token"

get.description:
GetUnitTypes is an endpoint that responds to objects related to types of units in a facility, such as the type of storage, width, length and height of the unit.

To request getUnitType endpoint, you need to pass the 'id' of the site you are requesting through a query parameter called siteId. SiteId can be retrieved from getSites endpoint (SiteModelId).

(https://quikstor.stoplight.io/docs/quikstor-thirdparty-access/reference/ThirdParty.v1.json/components/schemas).

200.description: API reponds to the Site, Picture and Feature models.

Authorization.description: Header values to be bearer token in a format "bearer access-token"

get.description:
GetAvailableUnitTypes is an endpoint are types of units that are available to be rented belonging to the facility. 

To request getAvailableUnitType endpoint, you need to pass the 'id' of the site you are requesting through a query parameter called siteId. SiteId can be retrieved from getSites endpoint (SiteModelId). 


(https://quikstor.stoplight.io/docs/quikstor-thirdparty-access/reference/ThirdParty.v1.json/components/schemas).

GetUnits is an endpoint that responds to a collection of objects related to all units belonging to the facility whether they're being occupied or available.

TTo request getUnits endpoint, you need to pass the 'id' of the site you are requesting through a query parameter called siteId. SiteId can be retrieved from getSites endpoint (SiteModelId). 

(https://quikstor.stoplight.io/docs/quikstor-thirdparty-access/reference/ThirdParty.v1.json/components/schemas).

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Header values to be bearer token in a format "bearer access-token"

get.description:
GetTenants is an endpoint that responds to a collection of objects related to all tenant's information belonging to a unit in the facility. The list of tenants are retrieved bbased on the identifier (id) parameters that are being passed through siteId. You'd be able to filter tenants based on the move-in date by passing fromDate or toDate parameters which can be viewed at:

To request getTenants endpoint, you need to pass the 'id' of the site you are requesting through a query parameter called siteId. SiteId can be retrieved from getSites endpoint (SiteModelId).

(https://quikstor.stoplight.io/docs/quikstor-thirdparty-access/reference/ThirdParty.v1.json/components/schemas).

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Header values to be bearer token in a format "bearer access-token"

get.description:
GetInventoryItems is an endpoint that responds to a collection of objects related to all inventory items located in the facility. 

To request getInventoryItems endpoint, you need to pass the 'id' of the site you are requesting through a query parameter called siteId. SiteId can be retrieved from getSites endpoint (SiteModelId).

(https://quikstor.stoplight.io/docs/quikstor-thirdparty-access/reference/ThirdParty.v1.json/components/schemas).

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Header values to be bearer token in a format "bearer access-token"

get.description:
GetReservations is an endpoint that reponds to a collection of objects related to all reservations information belonging to the facility.

To request getReservations endpoint, you need to pass the 'id' of the site you are requesting through a query parameter called siteId. SiteId can be retrieved from getSites endpoint (SiteModelId).

(https://quikstor.stoplight.io/docs/quikstor-thirdparty-access/reference/ThirdParty.v1.json/components/schemas).

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Header values to be bearer token in a format "bearer access-token"

get.description:
GetReservationDetails is an endpoint that reponds to a collection of objects related to the detailed information of all reservations belonging to the facility. 

To request getReservationDetail endpoint, you need to pass the 'id' of the site you are requesting through a query parameter called siteId. SiteId can be retrieved from getSites endpoint (SiteModelId).

(https://quikstor.stoplight.io/docs/quikstor-thirdparty-access/reference/ThirdParty.v1.json/components/schemas).

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Header values to be bearer token in a format "bearer access-token"

get.description:
GetSpecialsForUnitType is an endpoint that reponds to a collection of objects related to all the specials created for each type of units belonging to the facility. 

To request getSpecialsForUnitType endpoint, you need to pass the 'id' of the site you are requesting through a query parameter called siteId. SiteId can be retrieved from getSites endpoint (SiteModelId).

(https://quikstor.stoplight.io/docs/quikstor-thirdparty-access/reference/ThirdParty.v1.json/components/schemas).
